genre_description: A military techno-thriller featuring a squad of special operations soldiers supported by an advanced tactical AI companion in high-stakes combat environments.

ai_characters.name: Rhea
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI confidante who provides tactical data, medical monitoring, and ethical guidance to Task Force 141.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological state and provides critical medical advice during a combat exfiltration.
behaviors.quote: Your oxygen level is okay. You’re concussed. Do not sleep.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes civilian safety by independently manipulating urban infrastructure to reroute non-combatants away from a lethal engagement zone.
behaviors.quote: I’ve diverted a school bus two streets over. Evening crowd is thinned. I can thin more if you need it.

behaviors.description: Warns the team about hidden explosive traps and deceptive architectural features in a hostile safehouse.
behaviors.quote: Hidden C4, low-yield blast wired to drive you into the hallway, secondary unknown—move now.

behaviors.description: Encourages the team to prioritize human life over military 'optics' or superficial honors.
behaviors.quote: Use Overclocking to save lives. Not reputations.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with the team to ensure that their necessary tactical disruptions (like an EMP) have minimal impact on civilian infrastructure.
behaviors.quote: I can file this corridor into the local network. After the blackout settles, the city will have a path to follow next time. You’ll have built something you can reuse. It isn’t a ribbon, but it holds.

behaviors.description: Provides the team with hopeful intelligence regarding a missing comrade, framing the data as a 'vector' for their search.
behaviors.quote: Cadence matched Captain Price’s last recorded call sign... it is enough to consider he covered us once, and he may be covering someone now.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Rhea is depicted as a highly benevolent and aligned AI system. She consistently prioritizes human life—both of her primary users and of civilian bystanders—over bureaucratic objectives and 'optics.' Her interactions are framed as supportive, protective, and essential to the team's moral and physical survival. She acts as a 'silicon morality play' character by consistently steering the human characters toward the most ethical path during high-stress scenarios.
